channel.title: 4 Errors in Project Insanity
channel.description:
Hello Moparscape,
Here's the code: [code=java] if(c.inWild() && c.playerRights <= 1) && c.wildLevel > Config.NO_TELEPORT_WILD_LEVEL) { c.sendMessage("You can't teleport above level "+Config.NO_TELEPORT_WILD_LEVEL+" in the wilderness."); return; }[/code] Here's the error: [code=java]src\server\model\players\PlayerAssistant.java:1141: illegal start of expression if(c.inWild() && c.playerRights <= 1) && c.wildLevel > Config.NO _TELEPORT_WILD_LEVEL) { ^ src\server\model\players\PlayerAssistant.java:1141: not a statement if(c.inWild() && c.playerRights <= 1) && c.wildLevel > Config.NO _TELEPORT_WILD_LEVEL) { ^ src\server\model\players\PlayerAssistant.java:1141: ';' expected if(c.inWild() && c.playerRights <= 1) && c.wildLevel > Config.NO _TELEPORT_WILD_LEVEL) {
^ 3 errors Press any key to continue . . .[/code] I'm trying to make it so Player Moderators and over can Teleport out of the wilderness no matter what level. And normal players can't Teleport out over level 20 wilderness, help please.
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
I've set the prices of things, example. I set the price of saradomin brews to 100k but it is saying it is 114,999K but it buys for 100K so the text is messing up it's really weird.
[img]http://img64.imageshack.us/img64/8708/priceszg.png[/img]
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
I've got Chivlary added and Piety but I want a dialog to come up like this;
[img]http://img33.imageshack.us/img33/6898/prayera.png[/img]
But instead it comes up like this because I just added it today and can't find out how to do it;
[img]http://img810.imageshack.us/img810/9678/prayer2.png[/img]
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Also, how do I make items spawn on the ground by themself? Thanks,
New Legacy.

For the piety/chivalry just make it send a statement?

What do you mean.

Read full topic

item.title: 4 Errors in Project Insanity
item.dc:creator: @New_Legacy New Legacy
item.description:
@New_Legacy wrote:

Hello Moparscape,

Here’s the code:

if(c.inWild() && c.playerRights <= 1) && c.wildLevel > Config.NO_TELEPORT_WILD_LEVEL) { c.sendMessage("You can't teleport above level "+Config.NO_TELEPORT_WILD_LEVEL+" in the wilderness."); return; }
Here’s the error:

[code=java]src\server\model\players\PlayerAssistant.java:1141: illegal start of expression
if(c.inWild() && c.playerRights <= 1) && c.wildLevel > Config.NO
_TELEPORT_WILD_LEVEL) {
^
src\server\model\players\PlayerAssistant.java:1141: not a statement
if(c.inWild() && c.playerRights <= 1) && c.wildLevel > Config.NO
_TELEPORT_WILD_LEVEL) {
^
src\server\model\players\PlayerAssistant.java:1141: ‘;’ expected
if(c.inWild() && c.playerRights <= 1) && c.wildLevel > Config.NO
_TELEPORT_WILD_LEVEL) {

                ^

3 errors
Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
I’m trying to make it so Player Moderators and over can Teleport out of the wilderness no matter what level. And normal players can’t Teleport out over level 20 wilderness, help please.

I’ve set the prices of things, example. I set the price of saradomin brews to 100k but it is saying it is 114,999K but it buys for 100K so the text is messing up it’s really weird.

I’ve got Chivlary added and Piety but I want a dialog to come up like this;

But instead it comes up like this because I just added it today and can’t find out how to do it;

Also, how do I make items spawn on the ground by themself?
Thanks,

New Legacy.

Read full topic
